verses.verse: Moreover, <S%G1161><s%> brothers, <S%G80><s%> I would <S%G2309><s%> not that you should be ignorant, <S%G50><s%> how that all <S%G3956><s%> our fathers <S%G3962><s%> were under <S%G5259><s%> the cloud, <S%G3507><s%> and all <S%G3956><s%> passed <S%G1330><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the sea; <S%G2281><s%>
And were all <S%G3956><s%> baptized <S%G907><s%> to Moses <S%G3475><s%> in the cloud <S%G3507><s%> and in the sea; <S%G2281><s%>
And did all <S%G3956><s%> eat <S%G5315><s%> the same <S%G846><s%> spiritual <S%G4152><s%> meat; <S%G1033><s%>

And did all <S%G3956><s%> drink <S%G4095><s%> the same <S%G846><s%> spiritual <S%G4152><s%> drink: <S%G4188><s%> for they drank <S%G4095><s%> of that spiritual <S%G4152><s%> Rock <S%G4073><s%> that followed <S%G190><s%> them: and that Rock <S%G4073><s%> was Christ. <S%G5547><s%>
But with many <S%G4119><s%> of them God <S%G2316><s%> was not well <S%G2106><s%> pleased: <S%G2106><s%> for they were overthrown <S%G2693><s%> in the wilderness. <S%G2048><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things were our examples, <S%G5179><s%> to the intent we should not lust <S%G1511><s%> <S%G1938><s%> after <S%G1938><s%> evil <S%G2556><s%> things, as they also <S%G2548><s%> lusted. <S%G1937><s%>

Neither <S%G3366><s%> be you idolaters, <S%G1496><s%> as were some <S%G5100><s%> of them; as it is written, <S%G1125><s%> The people <S%G2992><s%> sat <S%G2523><s%> down <S%G2523><s%> to eat <S%G5315><s%> and drink, <S%G4095><s%> and rose <S%G450><s%> up to play. <S%G3815><s%>

Neither <S%G3366><s%> let us commit <S%G4203><s%> fornication, <S%G4203><s%> as some <S%G5100><s%> of them committed, <S%G4203><s%> and fell <S%G4098><s%> in one <S%G3391><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> and twenty <S%G1501><s%> thousand. <S%G5505><s%>

Neither <S%G3366><s%> let us tempt <S%G1598><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> as some <S%G5100><s%> of them also <S%G2532><s%> tempted, <S%G3985><s%> and were destroyed <S%G622><s%> of serpents. <S%G3789><s%>
Neither <S%G3366><s%> murmur <S%G1111><s%> you, as some <S%G5100><s%> of them also <S%G2532><s%> murmured, <S%G1111><s%> and were destroyed <S%G622><s%> of the destroyer. <S%G3644><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things happened <S%G4819><s%> to them for ensamples: <S%G5179><s%> and they are written <S%G1125><s%> for our admonition, <S%G3559><s%> on whom <S%G3739><s%> the ends <S%G5056><s%> of the world <S%G165><s%> are come. <S%G2658><s%>
Why <S%G5620><s%> let him that thinks <S%G1380><s%> he stands <S%G2476><s%> take heed <S%G991><s%> lest <S%G3361><s%> he fall. <S%G4098><s%>

There has no <S%G3756><s%> temptation <S%G3986><s%> taken <S%G2983><s%> you but such as is common <S%G442><s%> to man: <S%G442><s%> but God <S%G2316><s%> is faithful, <S%G4103><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> will not suffer <S%G1439><s%> you to be tempted <S%G3985><s%> above <S%G5228><s%> that you are able; <S%G1410><s%> but will with the temptation <S%G3986><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> make <S%G4160><s%> a way <S%G1545><s%> to escape, <S%G1545><s%> that you may be able <S%G1410><s%> to bear <S%G5297><s%> it.
Why, <S%G1355><s%> my dearly beloved, <S%G27><s%> flee <S%G5343><s%> from idolatry. <S%G1495><s%>
I speak <S%G3004><s%> as to wise <S%G5429><s%> men; judge <S%G2919><s%> you what <S%G3739><s%> I say. <S%G5346><s%>

The cup <S%G4221><s%> of blessing <S%G2129><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> we bless, <S%G2127><s%> is it not the communion <S%G2842><s%> of the blood <S%G129><s%> of Christ? <S%G5547><s%> The bread <S%G740><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> we break, <S%G2806><s%> is it not the communion <S%G2842><s%> of the body <S%G4983><s%> of Christ? <S%G5547><s%>

For we being many <S%G4183><s%> are one <S%G1520><s%> bread, <S%G740><s%> and one <S%G1520><s%> body: <S%G4983><s%> for we are all <S%G3956><s%> partakers <S%G3348><s%> of that one <S%G1520><s%> bread. <S%G740><s%>

Behold <S%G991><s%> Israel <S%G2474><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the flesh: <S%G4561><s%> are not they which eat <S%G2068><s%> of the sacrifices <S%G2378><s%> partakers <S%G2844><s%> of the altar? <S%G2379><s%>

What <S%G5101><s%> say <S%G5346><s%> I then? <S%G3767><s%> that the idol <S%G1497><s%> is any <S%G5100><s%> thing, or <S%G2228><s%> that which is offered <S%G1494><s%> in sacrifice <S%G1494><s%> to idols <S%G1494><s%> is any <S%G5100><s%> thing?

But I say, that the things which <S%G3739><s%> the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> sacrifice, <S%G2380><s%> they sacrifice <S%G2380><s%> to devils, <S%G1140><s%> and not to God: <S%G2316><s%> and I would <S%G2309><s%> not that you should have fellowship <S%G2844><s%> with devils. <S%G1140><s%>

You cannot <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1410><s%> drink <S%G4095><s%> the cup <S%G4221><s%> of the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> and the cup <S%G4221><s%> of devils: <S%G1140><s%> you cannot <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1410><s%> be partakers <S%G3348><s%> of the Lord's <S%G2962><s%> table, <S%G5132><s%> and of the table <S%G5132><s%> of devils. <S%G1140><s%>
Do we provoke <S%G3863><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> to jealousy? are we stronger <S%G2478><s%> than he?

All <S%G3956><s%> things are lawful <S%G1832><s%> for me, but all <S%G3956><s%> things are not expedient: <S%G4851><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things are lawful <S%G1832><s%> for me, but all <S%G3956><s%> things edify <S%G3618><s%> not.
Let no <S%G3367><s%> man <S%G3367><s%> seek <S%G2212><s%> his own, <S%G1438><s%> but every <S%G1538><s%> man another's <S%G2087><s%> wealth.
Whatever <S%G3956><s%> is sold <S%G4453><s%> in the shambles, <S%G3111><s%> that eat, <S%G2068><s%> asking <S%G350><s%> no <S%G3367><s%> question for conscience <S%G4893><s%> sake:
For the earth <S%G1093><s%> is the Lord's, <S%G2962><s%> and the fullness <S%G4138><s%> thereof. <S%G846><s%>

If <S%G1487><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> of them that believe <S%G571><s%> not bid <S%G2564><s%> you to a feast, and you be disposed <S%G2309><s%> to go; <S%G4198><s%> whatever <S%G3956><s%> is set <S%G3908><s%> before <S%G3908><s%> you, eat, <S%G2068><s%> asking <S%G350><s%> no <S%G3367><s%> question for conscience <S%G4893><s%> sake.

But if <S%G1437><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> man say <S%G2036><s%> to you, This <S%G5124><s%> is offered <S%G1494><s%> in sacrifice <S%G1494><s%> to idols, <S%G1494><s%> eat <S%G2068><s%> not for his sake that showed <S%G3377><s%> it, and for conscience <S%G4893><s%> sake: for the earth <S%G1093><s%> is the Lord's, <S%G2962><s%> and the fullness <S%G4138><s%> thereof: <S%G846><s%>

Conscience, <S%G4893><s%> I say, <S%G3004><s%> not your <S%G1438><s%> own, <S%G1438><s%> but of the other: <S%G2087><s%> for why <S%G2444><s%> <S%G5101><s%> is my liberty <S%G1657><s%> judged <S%G2919><s%> of another <S%G243><s%> man's conscience? <S%G4893><s%>

For if <S%G1487><s%> I by grace <S%G5485><s%> be a partaker, <S%G3348><s%> why <S%G5101><s%> am I evil <S%G987><s%> spoken <S%G987><s%> of for that for which <S%G3739><s%> I give thanks? <S%G2168><s%>

Whether <S%G1535><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> you eat, <S%G2068><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> drink, <S%G4095><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> whatever <S%G5100><s%> you do, <S%G4160><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> to the glory <S%G1391><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

Give <S%G1096><s%> none <S%G677><s%> offense, <S%G677><s%> neither to the Jews, <S%G2453><s%> nor <S%G2532><s%> to the Gentiles, <S%G1672><s%> nor <S%G2532><s%> to the church <S%G1577><s%> of God: <S%G2316><s%>

Even <S%G2504><s%> as I please <S%G700><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> men in all <S%G3956><s%> things, not seeking <S%G2212><s%> my <S%G1683><s%> own <S%G1683><s%> profit, <S%G4851><s%> but the profit <S%G4851><s%> of many, <S%G4183><s%> that they may be saved. <S%G4982><s%>
